question:
One of your friends lives in another country.you want to spend some time working in that country. Write a letter to your friend.
Describe why you want to work in that country.
Tell him about your skills and experience.
As some other questions related to work.
text: Hope everything is ok, and your family is safe,

Basically, the working environment here became so hard with much more loaded by stack-holders and management, otherwise the system itself feels more toughness, which led to frustration and missing quality of life, especially with some of rigorous decision boundary as well as VAT, residence fees and other factors related.

As you know, I am currently working in pharmaceutical company as a quality assurance lead chemist, within 20 years experience, and through this period time gained more professionally skills, like technical skills related to lab instrument, active ingredient measurement, results reporting and safety manner
Add to that, management skills including quantity management system, presentation skills, and some of marketing.
Therefore, really thinking about transferring to your country for new opportunity and challenge, to employ my skills and real stability.

Appreciate to let me now, what salary range as my same case and experience in your country?!! And also quantity of life, need more details about pharmaceutical companies names which looking for recruits, also medical assurance system quality, and if those companies support housing and transportation or wage included all benefits.
Finally, your response will really support my decision and make it very clear

error_list.error_des: It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase otherwise. Consider adding a comma.
The phrase some of rigorous decision boundary may require the use of the article the. Consider inserting the before the noun in your sentence.
It seems that boundary may not agree in number with other words in this phrase.
The noun phrase pharmaceutical company seems to be missing a determiner before it. Consider adding an article.
The word professionally doesn’t seem to fit this context. Consider replacing it with a different one.
The phrase some of marketing may require the use of the article the. Consider inserting the before the noun in your sentence.
It seems that there is an article usage problem here.
It seems that opportunity may not agree in number with other words in this phrase.
It seems that challenge may not agree in number with other words in this phrase.
The word now doesn’t seem to fit this context. Consider replacing it with a different one.
